shopifyCollection.title: Apparel
shopifyCollection.description: Pennants, but for your body! Original tees, long-sleeve tees, crewnecks, sweatshirts and kids apparel.
shopifyCollection.descriptionHtml: Pennants, but for your body! Original tees, long-sleeve tees, crewnecks, sweatshirts and kids apparel.

products.title: Let's Go Buffalo Crew Neck Sweatshirt
products.description: You might be stuck at home, but we know you still want to show your cat that you care. Rock this Let's Go Buffalo crew neck in or outside of the stadium (probably outside). Size Guide: Runs a bit big...recommend sizing down. XS S M L XL XXL Width (inches) 20.25 21.25 22.25 23.75 25.25 26.75 Length (inches) 25.5 26.5 27.5 28.5 29.5 30.5 Material: 100% Cotton French Terry Color: Navy Blue

products.title: Oxford Pennant Crewneck Sweatshirt
products.description: Pretend like you work here too (because let's be real, the employees only wear free Oxford stuff) with this cozy Oxford Pennant crew neck. If you really want to fit in, wear it 7 days a week (we don't judge!) Color: Gray crew neck, navy screen print
products.descriptionHtml:
Pretend like you work here too (because let's be real, the employees only wear free Oxford stuff) with this cozy Oxford Pennant crew neck. If you really want to fit in, wear it 7 days a week (we don't judge!) 

Color: Gray crew neck, navy screen print

products.title: Buffalo Pennant Tee
products.description: We encourage everyone to have as many pieces of "Let's Go Buffalo" gear as possible. Show off your pride with this Let's Go Buffalo pennant t-shirt.

products.description: Choose from two t-shirt options for your kid to rep your (and now their) Buffalo pride.
products.descriptionHtml: Choose from two t-shirt options for your kid to rep your (and now their) Buffalo pride.

products.title: America's Warmest Cold City™ Long Sleeve
products.description: Car’s stuck? Be right there!Working on the house? Let’s start at 7, I’ll grab coffees!Hungry? Let’s eat (and eat, and eat!)Team lost? We’ll have a shot and a Blue!Team won? We’ll have a shot and a Blue! Buffalo really is America’s Warmest Cold City™. Material: Cotton Color: Gray
products.descriptionHtml:
Car’s stuck? Be right there!
Working on the house? Let’s start at 7, I’ll grab coffees!
Hungry? Let’s eat (and eat, and eat!)
Team lost? We’ll have a shot and a Blue!
Team won? We’ll have a shot and a Blue! Buffalo really is America’s Warmest Cold City™. 

Material: Cotton

Color: Gray
